use-resources.name: Use Resources Folder
use-resources.description:
If enabled, will fetch all SFXs from the mod's Resources folder, instead of allowing for individual customization with all the settings listed here.
Enable if you wanna use Texture Packs as your method to load SFX instead of individual settings.

HitHead.name: Hit Head Sound
HitHead.description: Sound file to play when the Hit Head event is triggered.
